text: The boys' singles tournament of the 2019 Badminton Asia Junior Championships will be held from 24 to 28 July. Lakshya Sen from India clinched this title in the last edition. ==Seeds== Seeds were announced on 2 July.Individual events seeds # Kunlavut Vitidsarn (Champion) # Christian Adinata (Second round) # Syabda Perkasa Belawa (Third round) # Liu Liang (Final) # Li Yunze (Semifinals) # Park Hyeon-seung (Quarterfinals) # Yonathan Ramlie (Third round) # Bobby Setiabudi (Third round) ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== == References == == External links == *Main Draw Category:2019 Badminton Asia Junior Championships
title: 2019 Badminton Asia Junior Championships – Boys' singles
